title: How to Make a Bun Without a Hair Tie

steps.title: Pull your hair back about halfway up the back of your head as if about to make a ponytail.
steps.content: Pull your hair back about halfway up the back of your head as if about to make a ponytail. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Hold the ponytail from the base of it and use your other hand to bring it into a ball and hold it.
steps.content: Hold the ponytail from the base of it and use your other hand to bring it into a ball and hold it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Stick a pen, pencil, or like object through the bottom so that it sticks out of the top.
steps.content: Stick a pen, pencil, or like object through the bottom so that it sticks out of the top. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Still holding the bun with one hand, take the pen and make a 360 degree turn until it completes one circle around the bun.
steps.content: Still holding the bun with one hand, take the pen and make a 360 degree turn until it completes one circle around the bun.

steps.title: Using the pen, lift up a small strand of hair up from the top of your head just enough for it to go through.
steps.content: Using the pen, lift up a small strand of hair up from the top of your head just enough for it to go through.

steps.title: Pull the pen or pencil gently, tucking it under the strand so it's secure.
steps.content: Pull the pen or pencil gently, tucking it under the strand so it's secure. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Release.
steps.content: Release. If it seems to be staying, shake your head three times. If it wiggles, try again.
